name: Never. Stop. Learning.
description:
**If you purchase both this and the "Friendly Reminder" print and use the coupon code REMINDERS at checkout, you'll get $5 OFF the pair**

We can't get too comfortable. Go out and learn something new.

Hand pulled 12x19 print on French Paper Pop-Tone Bubblegum Pink with yellow, black and metallic silver ink.

Limited edition of 50.

*SHIPPING DETAILS* 
Shipping will be added at check out. Product will be mailed out the Saturday after purchase was made (if not earlier). US purchases: please allow 3-5 days for product to arrive. International purchase: may take up to 2 weeks to arrive.

name: A Friendly Reminder
description:

Limited edition of 35.

name: Ride Statewide Map

name: Chunk Shirt
description:
Guys! I'm stuck with the stiff!

Hand-printed on black, 100% cotton, Mossimo shirts (comparable to AA).

If a size you wish to order is no longer available, please email me at mike@mikewrogers.com to let me know.

*SHIPPING DETAILS* 
Shipping will be added at check out. Product will be mailed out the Saturday after purchase was made (if not earlier). US purchases: please allow 3-5 days for product to arrive. International purchase: may take up to 2 weeks to arrive.

name: Ride Statewide Shirt: SC Edition
description:
Bicycle appreciation for the state of South Carolina. Hand pulled on 100% cotton, dark blue, tagless shirts.

*SOLD OUT*
This item may be sold out here, but lucky for you, it can now be picked up over at my Society6 shop.

http://society6.com/mikewrogers

Go pick up a shirt and while you're there, grab an iPhone case and pillow to match!
